question: With reference to the International Trade, the International Harmonized System (HS) of goods is maintained by __:
explanation: The WCO maintains the international Harmonized System (HS) goods nomenclature, and administers the technical aspects of the World Trade Organization (WTO) Agreements on Customs Valuation and Rules of Origin. World Customs Organization (WCO) is an intergovernmental organization headquartered in Brussels, Belgium.
